Function reference

All functions

file_created_on()
Adds 'file_created_on'-variable to a tidy dataframe
get_model_dotplot()
Create ranef-dotplot from model
get_model_table()
create a tidy table out of the glmer-object to plot
get_unibas_palettes()
Get names of all unique palettes provided in unibas
ggCaterpillar()
ggCaterpillar plot from random effects model
n_agree()
get number of agreement answers (defined by a cutoff) in a vector
n_missing()
get number of NAs in a vector (complement to n_valid())
n_valid()
get sum of valid (not NAs) of a vector
prop_agree()
get (proportion) percentage agreement of answers in a vector - 'agreement' to be defined by cutoff
scale_color_unibas_d() scale_colour_unibas_d() scale_fill_unibas_d() scale_color_unibas_op() scale_colour_unibas_op() scale_fill_unibas_op() scale_color_unibas_div() scale_colour_unibas_div() scale_fill_unibas_div() scale_color_unibas_c() scale_colour_unibas_c() scale_fill_unibas_c()
Custom color and fill scales
theme_unibas()
unibas ggplot theme
unibas_color_palette_overview
unibas_color_palette_overview
unibas_pal unibas_pal_op unibas_pal_cont unibas_pal_div
Unibas colour palette to use in figures
